shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: Strike with your shield, dealing POW damage with a chance to stun.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: Spin in a wide arc, hitting all nearby enemies.

battle_roar.name: Battle Roar
battle_roar.description: Rally your strength, gaining a temporary POW boost.

guard_stance.name: Guard Stance
guard_stance.description: Adopt a defensive posture, reducing incoming damage.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: Strike from behind for high critical damage.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Create a cloud of smoke to escape or gain cover.

quickstep.name: Quickstep
quickstep.description: Dodge the next incoming attack with agile footwork.

throwing_knife.name: Throwing Knife
throwing_knife.description: Hurl a knife at your target from range.

piercing_arrow.name: Piercing Arrow
piercing_arrow.description: Fire an arrow that ignores enemy defenses.

snare_trap.name: Snare Trap
snare_trap.description: Set a trap that immobilizes enemies.

eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye
eagle_eye.description: Sharpen your senses, gaining an INS boost for detection.

twin_shot.name: Twin Shot
twin_shot.description: Fire two arrows in quick succession.

arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane_bolt.description: Launch a bolt of pure magical energy.

frost_snap.name: Frost Snap
frost_snap.description: Unleash a burst of frost that slows enemies.

fire_spark.name: Fire Spark
fire_spark.description: Conjure a spark of flame with a chance to burn.

mage_shield.name: Mage Shield
mage_shield.description: Create a magical barrier to protect yourself.

charm_spark.name: Charm Spark
charm_spark.description: Cast a spell to influence emotions and behavior.

hex_bolt.name: Hex Bolt
hex_bolt.description: Hurl a dark curse that deals damage over time.

potion_toss.name: Potion Toss
potion_toss.description: Throw an improvised potion with unpredictable effects.

glamour_veil.name: Glamour Veil
glamour_veil.description: Create an illusion that confuses and dazzles enemies.

inspiring_tune.name: Inspiring Tune
inspiring_tune.description: Play a melody that boosts ally resolve and morale.

mocking_melody.name: Mocking Melody
mocking_melody.description: Sing a taunting song that lowers enemy morale.

harmony_bolt.name: Harmony Bolt
harmony_bolt.description: Project a bolt of sonic energy at your target.

rhythm_step.name: Rhythm Step
rhythm_step.description: Move with musical rhythm, boosting your dodge ability.
